channel.title: [317] Basic tutorial for making a server
channel.description:
NONE of the links in this tutorial are mine in ANY way. [size=18pt]make sure you give the SOURCE credit on your server or that's leaching.[/size]
First download a source and client I recommend: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440269.0.html
Step One: Download your client and source and extract to desktop.
Step Two: Open your client.java folder Then press "ctrl+f" then search client name which is: Alex Isle Then simply change it to your name ex: AwesomeScape
Step Three: Once you have done that press "ctrl+s" And save it. After you saved this please run your combiler.
This is a VERY basic tutorial on how to make a 317. Please don't leave nasty comment's just leave them to yourself.
port forwarding guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=394201.0

item.title: [317] Basic tutorial for making a server
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

NONE of the links in this tutorial are mine in ANY way.
[size=18pt]make sure you give the SOURCE credit on your server or that’s leaching.[/size]

First download a source and client
I recommend: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440269.0.html

Step One:
Download your client and source and extract to desktop.

Step Two:
Open your client.java folder
Then press “ctrl+f” then search client name which is: Alex Isle
Then simply change it to your name ex: AwesomeScape

Step Three:
Once you have done that press “ctrl+s” And save it.
After you saved this please run your combiler.

This is a VERY basic tutorial on how to make a 317.
Please don’t leave nasty comment’s just leave them to yourself.

port forwarding guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=394201.0
